duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct a skills gap analysis and develop learning frameworks to support employee competence.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify challenges and recommend ways to increase productivity and learning within the flow of work.
Train, coach, mentor, and develop colleagues to higher levels of performance through effective training and coaching.
Design and deliver learning focused on customer service, efficient resourcing and planning, and change management in an international setting.
Collaborate with business partners to ensure consistency of programs that contribute effectively to the Company’s overall business strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Learning & Development, Human Resources, or Business Administration (MBA preferred)
